hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf $WORKSPACE/.venv3 python -m venv $WORKSPACE/.venv3
source $WORKSPACE/.venv3/bin/activate pip install https://github.com/ome/zeroc-ice-py-centos7/releases/download/0.3.0/zeroc_ice-3.6.5-cp38-cp38-linux_x86_64.whl pip install -U pip future setuptools pip install markdown # Avoid installing psutil for now # https://github.com/pytest-dev/pytest-xdist/issues/585 pip install mox3 pytest 'pytest-xdist<2' pip install tables pip install jinja2
rm -rf $WORKSPACE/*

OMERO_INSTALL=/tmp/omero-install/linux source $OMERO_INSTALL/settings.env
# UNZIP openmicroscopy OMERO_EXAMPLE_DIST=$WORKSPACE/openmicroscopy
ZIP=$(ls openmicroscopy*.zip) DIST=${ZIP%.zip} unzip -n $ZIP rm -f $ZIP mv $WORKSPACE/$DIST $OMERO_EXAMPLE_DIST
# UNZIP SERVER export OMERODIR=$WORKSPACE/OMERO.server
ZIP=$(ls OMERO.server*.zip) DIST=${ZIP%.zip} unzip -n $ZIP rm -f $ZIP mv $WORKSPACE/$DIST $OMERODIR
# load a virtual environment source $WORKSPACE/.venv3/bin/activate
for x in *.gz; do pip install $x done
cd $OMERODIR bash $OMERO_EXAMPLE_DIST/examples/Training/training_setup.sh mv training_ice.config $OMERO_EXAMPLE_DIST/examples/Training
omero sessions clear
# Run the Python and Java examples
export ICE_CONFIG=$OMERO_EXAMPLE_DIST/examples/Training/training_ice.config
# OMERO.py examples pip install --upgrade requests python $OMERO_EXAMPLE_DIST/examples/Training/python deactivate
# OMERO.java examples cd $OMERO_EXAMPLE_DIST/examples/Training/java/src javac -cp .:$OMERODIR/lib/client/* training/*.java java -cp .:$OMERODIR/lib/client/* training/Setup
